General.Name: Uniflex Technology Inc
General.Description: Uniflex Technology Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells flexible printed circuit (FPC) boards in Taiwan. It offers single-sided, double-sided, double access, and multi-layer FPC boards for use in various applications, such as information technology, communication, consumer electronics, automotive, medical equipment, and industrial equipment. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
